price: Kun waan waadaa galamtaniidha Cufa nama akkaan gara Rabbii deebi’aa tikfataa ta’eetiif, (jedhama).
arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hādhā mā tūʿadūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓin
